DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to put into your dream slot. At the start of each turn your dream card's cost is reduced by 1 and will automatically play when its cost is 0. After being played, its cost increases. The card is returned to your hand when you Dream again.
Reduce the cost of your Dream card. When the cost reaches 0, the card is played automatically.
This card's Dream cost is reduced by 1.
Doubles each turn. Upon reaching stacks equal to its max HP, it becomes Stunned for the turn.
Upon reaching a certain threshold, becomes Stunned. Threshold increases by 50% when stunned.
The next time you Manifest a Power or Exhaust card, it stays in your Dream slot instead of being removed.
Gain 3 Block upon playing this card.
Ethereal, Exhaust, Innate, Retain, Dreambound, etc. are all Modifiers.
